explanation: [0-0] A tattooed man is standing in a shower, covered in soap suds. He holds a colorful sponge on a stick to his mouth, eyes closed.

[0-4] The man, eyes still closed, takes a bite of the sponge. He then opens his eyes, removes the sponge, and spits out some foam. With his mouth open wide, he sticks out his tongue and shakes his head. Holding the stick in his left hand, he grabs the sponge with his right and pulls it off. He then holds up the stick vertically.
